review: The fire stick works great.  In order to get the most out of the fire stick you have to join Prime with Amazon.
author: George Nicholson Jr.

review: We love the Amazon Fire TV Stick. It was easy to get started and with Amazon Prime we can watch everything we want to see.
author: Terry

review: First, anything Amazon products is 5 stars. I love my fire tv stick, quick to install. Now I can watch everything available in Prime. Is a great buy under $40.
author: Singkwan Chow

review: had to return it  was very disappointed  I wish it worked
author: dennis m. king

review: This works well.  I watch things.
author: Nintendor

review: Miracast does not work with Windows.despite supposedly being a standard. Other than that, at $20 it is decent, at $40 there are better devices. Audio lags in HBO to go, Does not work with any universal remotes either.
author: B. Marranzini

review: It is very easy to install and use.
author: PATRICIA A. BELL
